EmailTemplate.description: Used to alert a customer that a new case has been created.
EmailTemplate.name: New Case Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Your support request has been received
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact_First_Name__c},
We've received your inquiry and have created a new support request to track in our system. If you have any additional questions, you can reply directly to this email.
We look forward to being in touch regarding your question in the next 24 business hours.
Best regards, The JH Outback Team
